title: Grinding Gear Games
content: Grinding Gear Games (abb. GGG) is a New Zealand video game developer company founded in 2006 and based in Auckland. A former independent developer, the studio was acquired by Chinese tech company Tencent in May 2018, after the Chinese company had published the studio's sole title, Path of Exile, in China (excluding Hong Kong and Macau).[2] The open-beta build of Path of Exile was released worldwide in January 2013[3] and the 1.0 version of the game was released in October 2013.[4]
